entry.title: Son Of A Devil
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,657Chapters: 5/100Kudos: 110

Summary: Buck is the son of Lucifer Morningstar. Maddie leaves when Evan is only thirteen. She rings Lucifer to tell him to take Evan to live with him in LA. Not wanting to leave him alone with the Buckley Parents.   First 5 chapters will be based before Buck joins the 118. Chapter 6 will Evan becoming a firefighter, and season 1. Chapter 7 it will season 1 of Lucifer and season 2 of 911. It will be fast paced, pushing quickly through the years until chapter 7 when the story of the present starts. The first 6 chapters are to just get an understanding of pre 118 life really. Yes will have a section of the lawsuit eventually.Because if you know me you know I love a lawsuit era fic and I want to see Lucifer and maze being protective over that time period haha Daily 911 Prompts Click Here

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,983Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,039Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,462Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: Buckley's Chance
entry.summary:
Author: RaspberryDreams1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,034Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 248

Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he’s been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn’t thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn’t believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: Buck, Baking and Baked
entry.summary:
Author: 118s_royalty

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,629Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: A familiar voice and face send a wave of cold shock down his body as the next video starts, his eyes widening as he stares at Buck on his screen. ‘Baking While Baked’ is plastered in bold letters across the top of his video, confusion seeping into Eddie’s face. “Hello, everybody. Welcome back to another video where I bake while being baked,” Buck winks, a sly smile sinking into his cheeks. His eyes are droopy, half-lidded, and red; his cheeks are flushed with a tint of pink, starting to spread across his nose and down his chin. His words come out slow, like honey dripping off his tongue. “I’m going to try doing ASMR, but the keyword here is try,” a soothing, deep chuckle rumbles through Buck’s chest, spreading warmth over Eddie’s body. Or where Buck posts videos on tiktok where he bakes while being baked. Eddie stumbles across them and ends up smoking with Buck and being a new addition to the videos. What happens when Eddie realizes something about himself that could put their relationship at risk?

entry.title: Like the universe is screaming at you
entry.summary:
Author: immentalaboutyou

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,895Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 16

Summary: When Buck first wakes up on Friday, May 12th of 2023, he's up for a completely normal day. You know, get up, do your chores, attend a few emergencies, rescue a few people. Go home, research some obscure syndromes, eat lunch, ponder about the meaning of life. The usual. It seems the Universe had other plans for him, because he gets the slight feeling that he's being sent a message, though he can't quite make out what the Universe is telling him. It might not be THAT important. Except the Universe seems to think that it is that important, and it is that serious, and he needs to get the message. So the next day, Evan Buckley is up for a surprise.

entry.title: Love in absentia
entry.summary:
Author: Grocerystoredivorce

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,130Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 180

Summary: “Why not? You don’t look out for yourself. Someone’s gotta do it.” “And you’re doing that how? By marrying me?” ”You—” There’s a pause on Eddie’s end of the line, like he’s just stopped himself from saying something regrettable. “I married you because you’re mine, Buckley.” “I’m— what?”  “You heard me.”  “We’re best friends, Eddie.” Buck needs the reminder just as badly as Eddie does, to be honest. It's a fantasy and unless he crushes it now, Buck’s going to wind up even more heartbroken. “And you’re straight.” Eddie just scoffs, “and you’re still mine.” / Eddie marries Buck, Buck finds out a few days later

entry.title: A Box Of Memories
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,710Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 82

Summary: Buck never got a baby box. No childhood photos carefully labeled, no tiny drawings tucked away, no reminders that his milestones ever mattered. And he’s okay with that — or at least he thinks he is — until Eddie overhears him quietly wishing for one. So Eddie decides to give Buck the one thing he never had: a box full of memories. Because Buck may not have gotten the childhood he deserved, but Eddie’s going to make damn sure the rest of his life is filled with nothing but happy memories.

entry.title: still waters
entry.summary:
Author: Iliveinthetrashcan

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,733Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: Buck has always felt too much.So that’s why it's odd to Buck that the pull has just disappeared. Ever since he was sent into that hallway, sobbing with a force so strong it brought him to his knees, it's been quiet. Normally, he would relish in that quiet, praise whatever god that had taken pity on him and listened, so that he could finally regulate his emotions somewhat normally. But the quiet is eerie, rather than calm, as if something is missing that he can’t quite place.The waters are calm and still, no little waves stirring him to feel irritation or anguish or sorrow or whatever the hell he’s supposed to be feeling in the fallout of Bobby’s death.He supposes he should feel some kind of guilt about that, too, but the waters don’t respond. Buck is almost afraid he left some part of himself behind in that godforsaken lab.The waters are calm, and Bobby’s dead, and all he can hear is “They’re going to need you”.OR, the buck character study on grief that we never got to see

entry.title: Repression is my Heaven but I’d Rather Go Through Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,556Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: For a heartbeat, neither of them moved. The morning sun glinted off her hair, the hum of a passing car filling the silence. Shannon shifted first, swallowing hard, her shoulders rising with a shaky breath. “Hi,” she said, her voice soft, tentative. “I’m… I’m Shannon. Eddie’s…” She faltered, her eyes flicking down, then back up to meet his. “Christopher’s mom.” Or, War didn’t break them. Distance didn’t. Shannon just might.
